bcbioSingleCell 0.1.0
  • Reference

Row Data

Source: R/methods-rowData.R

Metadata describing the genes.

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
rowData(x, return = c("data.frame", "DataFrame"))

# S4 method for seurat
rowData(x, return = c("data.frame", "DataFrame"))

Arguments

x

Primary object.
return

Return type. Uses base::match.arg() internally and defaults to the first argument in the vector.

Value

Return data as data.frame, or DataFrame.

See also

Other Data Functions: aggregateReplicates, calculateMetrics, cell2sample, colData, counts, fetchGeneData, fetchPCAData, fetchTSNEData, fetchTSNEExpressionData, filterCells, gene2symbol, interestingGroups, mapCellsToSamples, metricsPerSample, metrics, sampleData, selectSamples, subsetPerSample, topBarcodes

Examples

# bcbioSingleCell ====
rowData(bcb_small) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 500
#> Variables: 12
#> $ seqnames       <fct> 1, X, 17, X, 17, 8, 1, 12, 2, 10, 2, 5, 9, 11, 1, 12...
#> $ start          <int> 169849631, 2691179, 44248385, 119468400, 5440912, 56...
#> $ end            <int> 169894267, 2741309, 44268141, 119471319, 5469060, 56...
#> $ width          <int> 44637, 50131, 19757, 2920, 28149, 7287, 41764, 42640...
#> $ strand         <fct> -, +, -, +, -, -, -, -, +, +, +, +, -, +, +, -, +, -...
#> $ geneID         <chr> "ENSG00000000457", "ENSG00000002586", "ENSG000000049...
#> $ geneName       <chr> "SCYL3", "CD99", "SLC4A1", "SLC25A5", "DHX33", "RPS2...
#> $ geneBiotype    <fct> protein_coding, protein_coding, protein_coding, prot...
#> $ description    <chr> "SCY1 like pseudokinase 3 [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:HG...
#> $ seqCoordSystem <fct> chromosome, chromosome, chromosome, chromosome, chro...
#> $ entrezID       <I(list)> 57147,  4267,  6521,   292, 56919,  6224,  7812,...
#> $ broadClass     <fct> coding, coding, coding, coding, coding, coding, codi...

# seurat ====
rowData(pbmc_small) %>% glimpse()
#>  NULL
rowData(seurat_small) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 500
#> Variables: 12
#> $ seqnames       <fct> 1, X, 17, X, 17, 8, 1, 12, 2, 10, 2, 5, 9, 11, 1, 12...
#> $ start          <int> 169849631, 2691179, 44248385, 119468400, 5440912, 56...
#> $ end            <int> 169894267, 2741309, 44268141, 119471319, 5469060, 56...
#> $ width          <int> 44637, 50131, 19757, 2920, 28149, 7287, 41764, 42640...
#> $ strand         <fct> -, +, -, +, -, -, -, -, +, +, +, +, -, +, +, -, +, -...
#> $ geneID         <chr> "ENSG00000000457", "ENSG00000002586", "ENSG000000049...
#> $ geneName       <chr> "SCYL3", "CD99", "SLC4A1", "SLC25A5", "DHX33", "RPS2...
#> $ geneBiotype    <fct> protein_coding, protein_coding, protein_coding, prot...
#> $ description    <chr> "SCY1 like pseudokinase 3 [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:HG...
#> $ seqCoordSystem <fct> chromosome, chromosome, chromosome, chromosome, chro...
#> $ entrezID       <I(list)> 57147,  4267,  6521,   292, 56919,  6224,  7812,...
#> $ broadClass     <fct> coding, coding, coding, coding, coding, coding, codi...
